Text.Page: The in-flight meals leave something to be desired.

Actol hasn't gotten his sea…er, air legs yet.

My bunk's below his, so I want him healthy before tonight.

Could you check with the others for medicine or firewhiskey?

Air sickness? Sure. Not many people have the stomach to fly. I, on the other hand, have flown twice.

Try some Essenian ginger. There's probably some in the footlockers.

Oh, praise Velik, heck—praise Kaia, Seren, and Akasha, too. My stomach feels much better. Thanks.

Would you ask Fieri if there's anything to eat.

Oh, heck yeah. I'm the king of comfort food.

By the way, do you want to try my latest dish?

Come on, don't be shy. I learned from the most prominent chef in Arun.
(The smell reminds you of onions and argons.)

What? You're crazy. That dish is off the hook with flavor!

Here, try this one.

I'm telling you, that was a symposium of flavor! Shut the front door, I am amazing!

I should compete to be Arun Chef!
